akn:section.akn:heading: Fees for credentialing and background investigations in transportation

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Fees For fiscal year 2004 and thereafter, the Secretary of Homeland Security shall charge reasonable fees for providing credentialing and background investigations in the field of transportation: Provided, That the establishment and collection of fees shall be subject to the following requirements:
